channel.title: TensorRT on Jian's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in TensorRT on Jian's Blog

item.title: Custom Operator Development -- ScatterElements
item.description: In the project I have confronted with the problem that we do not have the built-in operator for add_index() function in PyTorch while deploying the model in embedded system with TensorRT. So I need to write a customable operator for ScatterElements operation. In this blog I documented the development process for custom oprator. Custom Operator Introduction
